query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiDiagnosticSurveys` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,
  `surveyType` enum('autoavaliacao', 'superior', 'pares', 'subordinados') NOT NULL,
  `respondentId` int NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pendente', 'em_andamento', 'concluida') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pendente',
  `sentAt` datetime,
  `completedAt` datetime,
  `reminderSentAt` datetime,
  `reminderCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiDiagnosticResponses` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `surveyId` int NOT NULL,
  `competencyId` int NOT NULL,
  `score` int NOT NULL,
  `comments` text,
  `behavioralExamples` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiProgressEvidences` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `itemId` int NOT NULL,
  `evidenceType` enum('certificado', 'documento', 'link_projeto', 'depoimento', 'foto', 'video', 'outro') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `fileUrl` varchar(512),
  `externalUrl` varchar(512),
  `uploadedBy` int NOT NULL,
  `uploadedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `isValidated` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `validatedBy` int,
  `validatedAt` datetime,
  `validationComments` text
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiRiskMitigations` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `riskId` int NOT NULL,
  `mitigationType` enum('preventiva', 'corretiva') NOT NULL,
  `actionDescription` text NOT NULL,
  `responsibleId` int NOT NULL,
  `dueDate` datetime NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('planejada', 'em_andamento', 'concluida', 'cancelada') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'planejada',
  `progress` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `completedAt` datetime,
  `effectiveness` enum('nao_avaliada', 'baixa', 'media', 'alta') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nao_avaliada',
  `effectivenessNotes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiCheckIns` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,
  `checkInDate` datetime NOT NULL,
  `checkInType` enum('mensal', 'trimestral', 'semestral', 'ad_hoc') NOT NULL,
  `conductedBy` int NOT NULL,
  `participantIds` text,
  `overallProgress` int NOT NULL,
  `onTrack` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `accomplishments` text,
  `challenges` text,
  `nextSteps` text,
  `supportNeeded` text,
  `planAdjustments` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiMilestones` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `milestoneType` enum('competencia_desenvolvida', 'certificacao_obtida', 'projeto_concluido', 'promocao', 'reconhecimento', 'outro') NOT NULL,
  `targetDate` datetime,
  `achievedDate` datetime,
  `status` enum('planejado', 'em_andamento', 'alcancado', 'nao_alcancado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'planejado',
  `impactDescription` text,
  `wasCelebrated` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `celebrationNotes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
